description: Smallest number k==3 (mod 4) such that Q(sqrt(-k)) has class number n.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Class Number.
mathematica: (* First do <<NumberTheory`NumberTheoryFunctions` *) a=Table[0, {50}]; Do[If[SquareFreeQ[n], c=ClassNumber[ -n]; If[c<=50&&a[[c]]==0, a[[c]]=n]], {n, 3, 3200, 4}]; a
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 17 2001
